alfredsnippet.snippet:
Hi {cursor},

I am actively looking for my next opportunity following COVID related layoffs, so I've attached a copy of my updated resume for your review. I'm very open to Software Account Management, Quality Assurance, Automation Testing, and Software Development roles and would greatly appreciate the opportunity to learn more about any roles you may have open.

Thanks for your time, and I hope you and your family are staying safe!
alfredsnippet.name: I'm actively looking
